job_details.Functieomschrijving:
For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks., * You will work on a project that is considered to be innovative for ING.
     * A challenging working environment, that can be considered to have the characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company.
     * International working environment; TECH/Group Services is bank wide provider of IT solutions, hence AI solutions you work on will often be used globally.
     * A culture where generating new ideas is are highly appreciated.
     * We work in an agile way.
     * 36/40 hours.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks., * You will work on a project that is considered to be innovative for ING.
     * A challenging working environment, that can be considered to have the characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company.
     * International working environment; TECH/Group Services is bank wide provider of IT solutions, hence AI solutions you work on will often be used globally.
     * A culture where generating new ideas is are highly appreciated.
     * We work in an agile way.
     * 36/40 hours.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on cloud infrastructure, deployment, and operationalization using tools like Terraform and Azure DevOps (though GCP is the primary cloud platform mentioned in the role). While it mentions Generative AI and LLMs, the core responsibilities and technologies listed (GCP, DialogFlow, Vertex AI Search, Looker, BigQuery) point towards a Cloud Engineer role that *supports* AI products rather than developing or deeply engineering the AI models themselves. The emphasis is on infrastructure, pipelines, and operationalizing existing AI services, not on core AI model development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer. The role also lacks the deep ML modeling aspects of an ML Engineer. Therefore, it falls into the 'Ambiguous' category as it's primarily a cloud infrastructure role with AI product integration, rather than a core AI development role.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves writing code to interact with GCP APIs and productizing/operationalizing cloud-native applications, which are core software development activities to support AI products.
job_tasks.phrase: Writing code to interact with GCP API's

job_tasks.justification: Productizing and operationalizing applications for production environments is a key software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

job_tasks.justification: Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions, especially those involving AI technologies, falls under MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.

job_tasks.justification: Creating data pipelines, especially those interacting with AI services like DialogFlow, is part of operationalizing and maintaining AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.

job_tasks.justification: Implementing ML architectures on GCP is an operational task focused on deploying and managing AI infrastructure.
Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team relates to building and maintaining the operational environment.
job_tasks.phrase: Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.

job_tasks.justification: Implementing specific GCP services for data and AI search/conversation management are operational tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.

job_tasks.justification: Automation of bottlenecks is a key aspect of improving operational efficiency.
Understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions to meet them is a core business understanding task.
job_tasks.phrase: As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs

job_tasks.justification: Informing on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize platforms and increase efficiency demonstrates an understanding of business impact.
job_tasks.phrase: and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies.

soft_skills.phrase: partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE)
A culture where generating new ideas is are highly appreciated.
We work in an agile way.
supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions
